sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - தூரமாயிரு, தூரமாகு, தூரம், தழுவு, கட்டுவிடு, அகற்று, தூரப்படுத்து, தூரமாக்கு, கடந்திரு, தூரமாய் விலகு, தூரம் பரவு
1) to be (or to become) far, to be (or to become) distant, to be removed, to go far away
a) (Qal) to be far, to be distant
b) (Piel) to send far away, to extend
1) to make or exhibit distance, to be gone far
2) to remove, to put far away

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to widen (in any direction), that is, (intransitively) recede or (transitively) remove (literally or figuratively, of place or relation): - (a, be, cast, drive, get, go, keep [self], put, remove, be too, [wander], withdraw) far (away, off), loose, X refrain, very, (be) a good way (off).
Cognate: H4801, H7350, H7368, H7369
